EmailTemplate.description: To be used by CS when customer fails cloudcheck and id and address needs to be verified manually.
EmailTemplate.name: Verify ID and address
EmailTemplate.subject: More info needed to check your identity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Template
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
‌
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}
We need a little more to be able to ID you. Email us another type of ID and we can get you up and running with Tempo within a day or two.
Email us: 1. Certified copies of another type (or types) of current ID and 2. Proof of your current address.
1. Email a certified copy of your ID Select from the following ID options:
One of any of these: • NZ passport • NZ certificate of identity • NZ refugee travel document • NZ firearms licence • Overseas passport • A national identity card
OR
Two types of ID • Your NZ driver licence AND one of any of these: • A bank account or credit card statement (within last 12 months) • A letter from a government agency that contains your name
OR
Two types of ID One of any of these: • NZ birth certificate • Certificate of NZ citizenship • Citizenship certificate issued by a foreign government • A birth certificate issued by a foreign United Nations government AND one of any of these: • Kiwiaccess (18+ card) • NZ driver licence • Valid and current international driver licence.
ID can be certified by a lawyer, teacher, kaumatua, doctor, accountant, Justice of the Peace, court official, or police officer.
2. Email us proof of your current address: This doesn't need to be certified. Select one of any of these: • A recent bank statement • Power, gas, or insurance bill • Local council letter • Rental agreement or tenancy letter • Letter from a government department.
Please email us if you have any further questions, we'll help you get started with Tempo.
Thank you Tempo Customer Support
{!Case.Thread_Id}
‌
